title: The Princelings of the East - The Trilogy
description: Suitable for all ages, The Princelings of the East is a trilogy relating the adventures of unlikely guinea pig heroes Fred and George. Two innocents abroad, they solve problems caused by unintended consequences, commercial greed, and blind prejudice yet still find time to engage in troubled love affairs and nearly blow themselves up with their own inventions.Here for the first time are all three books together in one volume:The Princelings of the EastThe Princelings and the PiratesThe Princelings and the Lost City
author: Jemima Pett
